Text: Happy to say that Fox & DirecTV settled their little squabble (I knew they would). But I did send my cousin  your way to d/l your SOA's. I told her that "sure there's plenty out there" but that your's are good and she wouldn't have to worry. She's a very happy camper right now, getting caught up on her Sons.

Yeap, I'm glad that's sorted now :)

Thanks so much for the referral :) Nice to get positive feedback.
this season is sick as hell cant wait for the next episode but at the same time hate waiting a year for a season so i dont want it to end great job and THANK YOU

Know what you mean mate, it's coming to an end all too soon! but at least it's been renewed for season 5 :) 
Also, thank you for your feedback (and past feedback) always appreciated.
